revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Fullmoon Island |image = [[File:Fullmoon Island.png|300px]] |caption = A bird's-eye view of Fullmoon Island. |tokens = 96,500 |location = The leftmost island off the northwestern coast of Sinnoh. }} '''Fullmoon Island''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It initially has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 2,653,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Illumise.png|40px]] Illumise || rowspan=4 colspan=2 | <center> N/A |- | [[File:Minun.png|40px]] Minun |- | [[File:Hypno.png|40px]] Hypno |- | [[File:Luvdisc.png|40px]] Luvdisc |}
===Boss Encounters=== <!--T:5-->
<!--T:6--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Clefable.png|40px]] Clefable || <center>11,000,000 || colspan=3 | <center> N/A |}
== Items == <!--T:7-->
<tabs> <!--T:8--> <tab name="No Debuff">
<!--T:9--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || 2 || 50.49% || 48.88% || 42.13% |- | {{Bag2|Nanab}} || N/A || 25.24% || 24.44% || 21.06% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|White Shard}} || N/A || 20.21% || 21.38% || 26.28% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Mind Plate}} || N/A || 4.05% || 5.30% || 10.53% |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:10-->
<!--T:11--> After Reaching Alola, the drop chance for items in Sinnoh will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
<!--T:12--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || 2 || 50.05% || 50.05% || 50.05% |- | {{Bag2|Nanab}} || N/A || 25.03% || 25.03% || 25.03% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|White Shard}} || N/A || 24.02% || 24.02% || 24.02% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Mind Plate}} || N/A || 0.90% || 0.90% || 0.90% |} </tab> </tabs>
